bill_title: authorize the Department of Game, Fish and Parks to sell and convey real and personal property located at the Spring Creek Recreation Area and to declare an emergency.
keywords: Department of Game, Fish, and Parks

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize the Department of Game, Fish and Parks to sell and convey real and personal property located at the Spring Creek Recreation Area and to declare an emergency. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. Notwithstanding the provisions of chapters 5-9, 5-23, and 5-24, the Department of Game, Fish and Parks may sell its interest in the structures and personal property used in the operation of the Spring Creek marina at the Spring Creek Recreation Area, Hughes County, South Dakota, to the concessionaire selected pursuant to the rules promulgated by the Game, Fish and Parks Commission. Section 2. The property set forth in section 1 of this Act shall be sold for no less than the fair market value as determined by an appraisal. Section 3. The proceeds of the sale shall be deposited in the parks and recreation revolving fund. Section 4. Whereas, this Act is necessary for the support of the state government and its existing public institutions, an emergency is hereby declared to exist, and this Act shall be in full force and effect from and after its passage and approval.

bill_versions.bill_version: House Agriculture and Natural Resources Engrossed
bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize the Department of Game, Fish and Parks to sell and convey real and personal property located at the Spring Creek Recreation Area and to declare an emergency. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. Notwithstanding the provisions of chapters 5-9, 5-23, and 5-24, the Department of Game, Fish and Parks may sell its interest in the structures and personal property used in the operation of the Spring Creek marina at the Spring Creek Recreation Area, Hughes County, South Dakota, to the concessionaire selected pursuant to the rules promulgated by the Game, Fish and Parks Commission. Section 2. The property set forth in section 1 of this Act shall be sold for no less than the fair market value as determined by an appraisal. Section 3. The proceeds of the sale shall be deposited in the parks and recreation revolving fund. Section 4. Whereas, this Act is necessary for the support of the state government and its existing public institutions, an emergency is hereby declared to exist, and this Act shall be in full force and effect from and after its passage and approval. Section 5. This Act is repealed on July 1, 2009.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize the Department of Game, Fish and Parks to sell and convey real and personal property located at the Spring Creek Recreation Area and to declare an emergency. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. Notwithstanding the provisions of chapters 5-9, 5-23, and 5-24, the Department of Game, Fish and Parks may sell its interest in the severed structures and personal property used in the operation of the Spring Creek marina at the Spring Creek Recreation Area, Hughes County, South Dakota, to the concessionaire selected pursuant to the rules promulgated by the Game, Fish and Parks Commission. Section 2. The property set forth in section 1 of this Act shall be sold for no less than the fair market value as determined by an appraisal or the price paid by the Department of Game, Fish and Parks for the property, whichever is greater. Section 3. The proceeds of the sale shall be deposited in the parks and recreation revolving fund. Section 4. Whereas, this Act is necessary for the support of the state government and its existing public institutions, an emergency is hereby declared to exist, and this Act shall be in full force and effect from and after its passage and approval. Section 5. This Act is repealed on July 1, 2009.
